name: listAliases
description: Retrieves a list of aliases for the authenticated User or Team. When `domain` is provided, only aliases for that domain will be returned. When `projectId` is provided, it will only return the given project aliases.

domain.description: Get only aliases of the given domain name

from.description: Get only aliases created after the provided timestamp

limit.description: Maximum number of aliases to list from a request

since.description: Get aliases created after this JavaScript timestamp

until.description: Get aliases created before this JavaScript timestamp

rollbackDeploymentId.description: Get aliases that would be rolled back for the given deployment

teamId.description: The Team identifier or slug to perform the request on behalf of.

$ul: **pagination**: This object contains information related to the pagination of the current request, including the necessary parameters to get the next or previous page of data.
**count**: Amount of items in the current page.
**next**: Timestamp that must be used to request the next page.
**prev**: Timestamp that must be used to request the previous page.
